summary: This document is the FY-2019 Annual Training schedule for staff at the Metropolitan Correctional Center in New York. It outlines a multi-week training program covering topics such as ethics, inmate supervision, use of force, suicide prevention, and the prevention of sexually abusive behavior (PREA). The schedule lists classes, times, and instructor codes but does not name specific individuals involved in the Epstein case.
locations: 26 Federal Plaza, 6th Floor, Classroom J or 1, New York, NY
keyFacts: The document is a Bureau of Prisons staff training schedule for the Metropolitan Correctional Center (MCC) in New York for fiscal year 2019.
Training topics included the Sexually Abusive Behavior Prevention & Intervention Program (PREA), suicide prevention, use of force, and inmate discipline.
The schedule ran from March 4, 2019, to May 3, 2019, with training held at 26 Federal Plaza in New York City.
No specific individuals related to the Epstein case are named in this administrative training document.
The MCC New York was the facility where Jeffrey Epstein was detained and died in August 2019.
